positions.title: Sergeant

positions.description:
- Reported to Assistant State Attorneys in the Felony Division.
- Responsible for legal research and writing, as well as case preparation for felony prosecutions. 
- Drafted legal documents including in-house briefs, memoranda, traverses, and other State responses to defense motions. 
- Participated in depositions and pre-file conferences. 
- Contacted victims, witnesses, and law enforcement officers in preparing cases.
positions.title: Volunteer Legal Clerk

positions.description:
- Reported to Wellness Center Assistant Director. 
- Oversaw 10 Fitness Supervisors. 
- Trained employees on gym procedures and customer service skills. 
- Resolved patron issues and complaints. 
- Advised Wellness Center Director on various gym decisions.
- Promoted after one year as Fitness Supervisor and after four months as Fitness Assistant.
- Employee of the Semester in Fall 2007 and Spring 2008.
positions.title: Senior Fitness Supervisor
